ISSUE.TITLE: Horizontal legend overlaps chart on small screens
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When viewing a chart with a small container width (<= 600px perhaps), the chart legend is configured to switch to horizontal mode. When the legend displays in horizontal mode, it can be seen to overlap the chart, particularly when there are several legend items: ![Screenshot_20190605_145026](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17307/58954353-a210b880-87a1-11e9-94c4-227ba3640066.png) ## Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a chart (e.g. editing it in the Visualization Editor) 2. Ensure legend is visible 3. resize the chart container to < 600 px (e.g. by resizing the browser screen or opening devtools) I believe the legend should not overlap the chart, as it can hide information. ### Technical details: * Redash Version: 6.x * Browser/OS: Kubuntu 19.04, Firefox 67 * How did you install Redash: Git in development version
